*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Austin, April 6, 1826. Asking instructions concerning juris liction in Robertson's colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bravo*/location_mentioned*—*date_mentioned n="04-06-186">6th April 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p*
*p*We have been Looking for you for a week past at this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Doct. Robertson*/person_mentioned* has Returned *location_mentioned*Home */location_mentioned*To *location_mentioned*Tennessee */location_mentioned*without Effecting any considerable object in the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*above he has written me and says that he wishes the authority of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*to Extend above untill ther should be forty *person_mentioned*familys */person_mentioned*settled in that *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*I am Now Requested to Remove Early who has put them all at defiance and says that he will hold his place in spite of them and threttens the Life of the *person_mentioned*Barrer */person_mentioned*of this who is the owner of the Tract of Land that he is on *person_mentioned*Maj. Sterling C. Robertson*/person_mentioned* what should I doo in this case shall I put Early off or not */p* *p**person_mentioned*Jno P Coles */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*P. Maj Robertson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
